appUpdated.description: Label for the app updated alert

seeWhatIsNew.description: Label for the description to see what's new

view.description: Label for the button to view the update

reviewTitle.description: Thank the user for using the application

reviewDescription.message: Hi, I'm $NAME$. I created $APP_NAME$ to help people save time and automate their tasks. If you enjoy using it, I'd appreciate a 5-star rating to help others discover $APP_NAME$. Thanks so much!
reviewDescription.description: Ask the user to leave a review for the application

addReview.description: Label for the button to add a review for the application

signIn.description: Label for the button to sign in

focusConnectedTab.description: Label for button to focus the connected tab

connectFromThisTab.description: Label for button to connect from the current tab

invalidTab.message: This page cannot be automated. Please try a different page.
